articles.title: Citi fined $79 million by British regulators over fat-finger trading and control errors - CNBC
articles.description: British regulators on Wednesday dished out a combined £61.6 million ($79 million) in fines to U.S. investment bank Citi for failings in its trading systems and controls.
articles.content:
LONDON British regulators on Wednesday dished out a combined £61.6 million ($79 million) in fines to U.S. investment bank Citi for failings in its trading systems and controls.
